channel.title: My d plate glitches + all what i add goes to my hand
channel.description: my Dpl8 glitches like this: when i put fire cape (or any cape) it glitches the cape go trought the plate so how can i fix this? and when i added staff capes ( they dont have drop model and somebody need to add drop model because i dont know how :rolleyes: and when i put SilentCJ's custom d pl8 on, it goes to my hand too all staff capes :( so how can i fix this.

item.title: My d plate glitches + all what i add goes to my hand
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

mkay, what you do is open the item.java (and item4.java if you have it) in the server folder. then find what it is, like dplate is a platebody, search body and plate (one at a time) and add the id of the d plate after the {, save compile and run again. it will equip to the right area with no glitches.

Read full topic
item.source: My d plate glitches + all what i add goes to my hand
